channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Paris prosecutors raid X offices as part of investigation into child abuse images
item.description: The prosecutors raided the offices of X as part of a preliminary investigation into allegations including spreading child sexual abuse images and deep...

item.title: A Role Model for How to Die
item.description: What if you really did live every day as if it were your last? That was Brian’s plan.

item.title: This is How Hard It Will Be to Get Around Italy’s Winter Olympics
item.description: The Games in northern Italy, which start on Friday, will be spread across 8,500 square miles. Long distances, narrow roads, complex connections and sn...

item.title: Palestinians Return to Gaza for First Time in Nearly Two Years
item.description: Only 12 returnees reunited with families. Some said their arrival carried larger weight, defying any notion of permanently displacing Gazans.

item.title: 5 papers from the Super Bowl of Economics
item.description: Planet Money went to the annual meeting of the American Economics Association, and we saw some fascinating papers presented there.

item.title: PepsiCo will cut prices on Lay's, Cheetos by as much as 15%
item.description: The food giant is among many big brands worried as shoppers pull back on snack budgets after years of stubborn inflation.

item.title: Polls Show Strong G.O.P. Support for Trump on Immigration
item.description: A small, but growing, share of Republicans say that enforcement has gone too far, after the killing of two Minneapolis protesters.
